# A project to visualise publicly available data in Singapore

# Libraries

```{r, error=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(simplevis)
```

# Crude Birth Rate Data

```{r}
crude_birth_rate <- read_csv("data/births-and-fertility-annual/crude-birth-rate.csv")

```

# Plot Crude Birth Rate

```{r}
crude_birth_rate %>% 
  gg_line(x_var = year,
          y_var = value,
          title = "Crude Birth Rate",
          caption = "Source: data.gov.sg",
          theme = theme_bw())

```
